getAppId() - Method in class com.amazon.identity.auth.device.authorization.api.AmazonAuthorizationManager
This method returns the application Id.
getAppVariantId() - Method in class com.amazon.identity.auth.device.authorization.api.AmazonAuthorizationManager
This method returns the application variant Id.
getAuthError(Throwable, Class<T>) - Static method in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
Helper Method that gets a general AuthError object for unexpected errors, the class is passed in so that a more detailed message can be generated.
getAuthError(Throwable, Class<T>, AuthError.ERROR_TYPE) - Static method in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
Helper Method to that gets a general AuthError object for specific errors, the class is passed in so that a more detailed message can be generated.
getCategory() - Method in enum com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError.ERROR_TYPE
 
getCategory() - Method in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
 
getErrorBundle(AuthError) - Static method in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
Helper Method to put the AuthError in a Bundle
getErrorBundle(Intent) - Static method in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
Helper Method to help an Intent that has an AuthError put the AuthError in a Bundle
getErrorBundle(Throwable, Class<T>, AuthError.ERROR_TYPE) - Static method in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
Helper Method that generates a Bundle with an AuthError in it based upon the throwable and the type, the class is passed in so that a more detailed message can be generated.
getProfile(APIListener) - Method in class com.amazon.identity.auth.device.authorization.api.AmazonAuthorizationManager
This method requests basic profile information for a user (using OAuth 2.0) for the scopes requested in the last call to #authorize(String[], AuthorizationListener).
getToken(String[], APIListener) - Method in class com.amazon.identity.auth.device.authorization.api.AmazonAuthorizationManager
This method handles requesting an authorization token (using OAuth 2.0) for the specified scopes for the given package.
getType() - Method in exception com.amazon.identity.auth.device.AuthError
